title: Erotic Countertransference, Irvin Yalom, and Protesting
description:
Dr. Kirk Honda talks with Rebecca Bloom about erotic countertransference, Irvin Yalom, and protesting.

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.

April 18, 2018.

Email: Contact@PsychologyInSeattle.com

List of all episodes: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com/list-of-episodes

Music by Bread Knife Incident.
